name: The Fable of Fairy Glen
description:
The Fable of Fairy Glen set in a fictitious glen in Wales. The Elves are the dominant force in the land. The Elven Empire extends across the earth.

There is Pixies, demon Elves and giant rats.

The Game features a short 30minutes - 1 hour story.

Helpful hints: Heal at the Celtic Cross, some of the characters speak Welsh and buy mana rejuvenation potions at the end game for best result. Save your gold, although, do you need to buy the accessory?

Different choices take the story on a slightly different tangent.

It is part of a potential new mini series...
